p: Results: Procalcitonin of BC-positive and BC-negative patients were 35.9}75.3 (7.8) and 17.1}30.9 (2.0) respectively. There are no significant differences between the patients. Presepsin of BC-positive and BC-negative patients were 2726}3208 i2147 jand 2733}2558 i2281 jrespectively, also, no significant difference between the groups.
